name: Asteroid Pitch
description:
You are a spaceship making its way through an asteroid belt. Use the up and down arrows to dodge icy asteroids. Your can hear your height by the pitch of the engine knocking, and if you do crash, your height determines the squeal of impact. Of course, this is all in your mind since sound can't travel in space. Hit browser refresh to play again.

I made the art and music and programmed the game with Scratch. I used https://musiclab.chromeexperiments.com/Song-Maker/ and Scratch to make the music and watched Zinnea's tutorial on scrolling backgrounds for help.
